name: Calculator
description: This calculator can do like a normally calculator. This calculator I created for understanding about basic of JavaScript.

name: Bookshelf
description: You can create a new book to shelf, move to unread or already read and remove it. This project is piece of Dicoding submission.

name: Simbox Search Movie
description: Simbox is application that can search anything of movies that you like. This project used OMDB API and based on JavaScript Lanjutan by Web Programming UNPAS, but I decided to improve some features and UI.

name: Quiz
description: This Quiz is contain the Trivia that I got from The Trivia API. Btw, This is My first React Js Project hehehe.

name: Shortly - Shorter Link
description: Link shortener from Frontend Mentor challenge with used shrtcode API to shorting a link.

name: Space Tourism
description: Multipage challenge project from Frontend Mentor in collaboration with Scrimba and Kevin Powell.

name: Imagerh | Photography portfolio
description: My friend's photography portfolio. It has home page act as a landing page, albums page as his his albums portfolio and booking page to book a date to photoshoot.
